programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team works to unravel a sex trafficking operation with ties to government offices, the police department and the Catholic church after one of their own is implicated in a cover-up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Carisi poses as a homeless man at a shelter to see if one of the resident sex offenders is tied to a string of rapes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous fashion photographer accused of raping a young model asks his successful brother to help him avoid charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a contestant from a reality dating series says she was raped; the producers of the series make Benson and the team part of the show.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: One day after a convicted rapist is exonerated by DNA evidence, a shocking new crime forces Fin and the team to search for the whereabouts of the man again.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a human skeleton is found on marshland and determined to be at least 18 months old, a computer consultant gives her a face and name.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for a missing teenager takes an emotional toll on Dodds; DNA evidence could lead to the teen's abductor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The futures of two high-school students are complicated by a murky date-rape case filled with dueling accusations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman is followed home and raped outside of her building, neighbors witness the crime but neglect to call for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Erin Lindsay and Antonio Dawson from Chicago P.D. help SVU when two convicted murderers escape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A psychiatrist specializing in the treatment of sex offenders is found badly beaten in a crack house and one of her recently paroled patients, the "Duct Tape Rapist," is the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy, 5, is abducted from his bed in the middle of the night, prompting detectives to take a hard look at the boy's estranged father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives interrogate a man who accuses his wife (Josie Bissett) of endangering the life of their unborn child through excessive drinking.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a man's mutilation on the subway, detectives discover he has been abducting women for years and forcing them to live in his dungeon.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Capt. Cragen search for suspects after a missing infant is discovered badly beaten in the bushes at a local park.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler hit a wall of silence while questioning fraternity brothers about the murder and sodomy of their hard-nosed pledge master.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate the rape and murder of two Arab-American women who were trying to improve relations among different groups.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives probe what looks like the ritualistic sacrifice of a 7-year-old Nigerian boy and uncover a slave-smuggling ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After finding out a dead teenage girl was a bully, detectives look for murder suspects at her school.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A child dies in the emergency room after passing out during a prayer vigil at a late-night church service.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for the sexual abuser of a child leads the detectives to a wealthy toy mogul known for his generous hospitality toward children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to decipher a motive for the strangulation of a Bronx assistant DA in an area where hookers stroll.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claiming to have been the victim of rape commits suicide while she is still in the emergency room.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mother becomes Stabler and Benson's prime suspect in the poisoning of her child; Novak enlists Clark's assistance in obtaining evidence to remove a judge from the bench after his bias in two child abuse cases leads to a wrongful arrest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A video voyeur catches a sexual assault against a minor on tape, which changes the focus of the investigation as the detectives search for a pedophile.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman attempts to kidnap a child she believes is her daughter; while DNA tests are in progress, Benson traces the confusion about the child's origins back to a fertility doctor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a Chinese woman's daughter is held for ransom by smugglers, the detectives turn to her sister for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 16-year-old girl is found in a deserted building, she tells the skeptical detectives that three men in uniform kept her there for several days.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A professor (Billy Campbell) accused of sexual assault volunteers to submit a DNA sample for testing, but the case turns into a he-said, she-said standoff.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must rely on a psychiatrist (Mary Stuart Masterson) and her schizophrenic patient to find the man behind a number of assaults on the Upper West Side.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A psychiatrist specializing in the treatment of sex offenders is found badly beaten in a crack house and one of her recently paroled patients, the "Duct Tape Rapist," is the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy, 5, is abducted from his bed in the middle of the night, prompting detectives to take a hard look at the boy's estranged father.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Details expose how the Gucci family was undone by jealousy, backstabbing, and, ultimately, an act of murder; insiders close to the fashion empire speak out about the murder of a prominent family member.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Details expose how the Gucci family was undone by jealousy, backstabbing, and, ultimately, an act of murder; insiders close to the fashion empire speak out about the murder of a prominent family member.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Anna Kolcheck returns to warn Callen that he is in danger and he must now work with an archenemy to stop an underground trafficking ring.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When an FBI agent is killed while trying to track the location of an undercover agent, NCIS must find the missing agent before the criminals find him.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the disappearance of a department of defense officer who was looking into a recent UFO sighting; Anna makes a bold decision about her future.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As a series of rapes on the Upper West Side puts the city on edge, a celebrity chef (Cybill Shepherd) fears she is the next victim when someone follows her home; Detective Benson has a hard time overcoming her traumatic ordeal.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler clash with an assistant U.S. attorney (Pam Grier) when their rape victim and their prime suspect disappear into witness protection.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two police officers in separate precincts attack their wives and demonstrate suicidal behavior, Benson and Stabler suspect a malaria drug both men received while serving in a reserve unit in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three cocky prep-school teens are prime suspects when a high-school student from Montreal vanishes during a class trip to New York.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage boy is killed in what appears to be a play fight, the victim's friend claims he filmed the death.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The only witness to the beating of a woman (Judy Kuhn) is her daughter (Paulina Gerzon) who has Williams syndrome.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A wealthy teen is found murdered in New York's Central Park, and the clues lead to a gang of homeless children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A pediatrician found guilty of sexually assaulting four of his patients is murdered; after three years in the Witness Protection Program, Alexandra Cabot returns.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a series of allegations are made against a superstar basketball player, Sgt. Benson and Detective Carisi (Peter Scanavino) do not agree on the authenticity of each woman's story; the investigation takes Rollins back to her former precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU faces the fury of social media fans when they arrest two popular influencer brothers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The creator of a dating app is accused of using it to rape women; Velasco's experience as an SVU detective is put on trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates a brutal attack on a group of law students; Benson hopes the discovery of a hidden camera will crack the case open; Carisi's best chance at conviction is catching the defendant in a lie.
